sage.animation

Class AnimationKeyFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.animation.AnimationKeyFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AnimationKeyFrame>

    public class AnimationKeyFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<AnimationKeyFrame>
    An AnimationKeyFrame contains the data describing a single keyframe of an animation: rotation and translation transforms to be applied to an object (e.g. a Joint), along with a time at which the object (Joint) should arrive at the specified transformed orientation.
    Author:
    John Clevenger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimationKeyFrame()
      This constructor creates a default AnimationKeyFrame with a time of zero and both rotation and translations also zero.
      AnimationKeyFrame(Joint joint, float time)
      Constructs a AnimationKeyFrame that is associated with a specific Joint and time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(AnimationKeyFrame frame)
      This method compares two AnimationKeyFrames in order to determine sorting order.
      static AnimationKeyFrame find(java.util.Collection<AnimationKeyFrame> c, float time)
      This method will find the nearest AnimationKeyFrame in a collection before or equal to the given time.
      graphicslib3D.Matrix3D getTransform()
      This method gets the AnimationKeyFrame's current transformation.
      void rotate(float angle, float rx, float ry, float rz)
      This method rotates the AnimationKeyFrame's current transformation around an angle-axis.
      void translate(float tx, float ty, float tz)
      This method translates the AnimationKeyFrame's current transformation.

    • Method Detail

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float angle,
                   float rx,
                   float ry,
                   float rz)
        This method rotates the AnimationKeyFrame's current transformation around an angle-axis.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle to rotate
        rx - The X component of the axis
        ry - The Y component of the axis
        rz - The Z component of the axis

      • translate

        public void translate(float tx,
                      float ty,
                      float tz)
        This method translates the AnimationKeyFrame's current transformation.
        Parameters:
        tx - The translation in the X direction
        ty - The translation in the Y direction
        tz - The translation in the Z direction

      • getTransform

        public graphicslib3D.Matrix3D getTransform()
        This method gets the AnimationKeyFrame's current transformation.
        Returns:
        the current transformation of the keyframe/

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(AnimationKeyFrame frame)
        This method compares two AnimationKeyFrames in order to determine sorting order. AnimationKeyFrames are sorted by time in ascending order.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<AnimationKeyFrame>

      • find

        public static AnimationKeyFrame find(java.util.Collection<AnimationKeyFrame> c,
                                     float time)
        This method will find the nearest AnimationKeyFrame in a collection before or equal to the given time.
        Parameters:
        c - The collection of AnimationKeyFrames
        time - The time to find
        Returns:
        The nearest keyframe before or equal to the given time.
